content: this mitens was created as a quick project from scraps basically anything that was left after other projects many crocheters certainly know what i m talking about at the same time it s so simple that it will allow you to understand how to work with crochet basics - how to change colors or use different stitches i hope you will find the pattern as easy and enjoyable as possible and the result will be wonderful mittens if you have any questions you can find me here ig loops n hooks
